name: Tina Parker
text: I rented a scanner at year end - for the last two years and placed 8 lateral file drawers of information on a single disc.  It is convenient and a money saver, I no longer have to send my files to document storage.  I love it!! Bruce was helpful and trained the part-time person I hired to do the scanning.  I highly recommend using Data Ventures.

name: thomas dunnavant
text: Bruce scanned all my documents and chopped them up in little bitty pieces.  I have my space back and i have a new friend with Data Ventures.
